title: BRIEF-Anglo American's Unki Platinum Mine To Be Audited Against IRMA ‘Standard For Responsible Mining'

BRIEF-Anglo American's Unki Platinum Mine To Be Audited Against IRMA ‘Standard For Responsible Mining'

Stock Markets 53 minutes ago (Sep 30, 2019 11:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Anglo American's Unki Platinum Mine To Be Audited Against IRMA ‘Standard For Responsible Mining' Sept 30 (Reuters) - Anglo American PLC : * ANGLO AMERICAN - UNKI PLATINUM MINE IN ZIMBABWE FIRST TO "PUBLICLY COMMIT" TO BE INDEPENDENTLY AUDITED AGAINST IRMA ‘STANDARD FOR RESPONSIBLE MINING' * ANGLO AMERICAN - WILL BE PUTTING ALL MANAGED MINES THROUGH CERTIFICATION AGAINST IRMA ‘STANDARD FOR RESPONSIBLE MINING' PROCESSES BY 2025 * ANGLO AMERICAN - OTHER OPERATIONS COMPLETING IRMA SELF-ASSESSMENT STAGE INCLUDE BARRO ALTO NICKEL OPERATION IN BRAZIL, AMANDELBULT PGM IN SOUTH AFRICA
